member.name: IDWriteFontFace4.GetGlyphImageData
member.summary: Gets a pointer to the glyph data based on the desired image format.
member.param: The ID of the glyph to retrieve image data for.
Specifies which formats are supported in the font.
On return contains data for a glyph.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteFontFace4.GetGlyphImageFormats
member.summary: Gets all the glyph image formats supported for the specified glyph.
member.param: The identifier of the glyph to be queried.
The lowest pixels per em value to query.
The highest pixels per em value to query.
An array of specifying the supported formats for the requested glyph.

member.name: IDWriteFontFace4.GetGlyphImageFormats
member.summary: Gets all the glyph image formats supported by the entire font.
member.returns: Returns all the glyph image formats supported by the entire font.

member.name: IDWriteFontFace4.ReleaseGlyphImageData
member.summary: Releases the table data obtained from ReadGlyphData.
